productId: Immutable anchor. Format BB-{PREFIX}-000-{NNNN}. Trace back to source.
websiteSku: BestBottles.com SKU. Shown as watermark on PDP.
graceSku: Grace internal SKU. Used in component cards and FitmentDrawer.
shape: Cylinder|Tulip|Round etc. Shown in PDP specs.
applicator: Applicator type. See schema for full union.
productUrl: BestBottles product page. PDP "View on BestBottles" link.
components: Compatible component SKUs by type. PDP fitment carousel.
graceDescription: Grace description. Preferred over itemDescription on PDP.
